card.name: Blazing Beetle
card.text: Flying This creature can't block Whenever a land card is put into a graveyard from anywhere, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Churning Birth
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create X 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens, where X is the number of land cards in your graveyard. Those tokens gain haste until end of turn. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Ignos, Magmakin Veintapper
card.text: First strike Whenever Ignos deals combat damage to a player, discard up to three cards, then draw that many cards. When you discard one or more cards this way, target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each card discarded this way. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

card.name: Pyroclastic Pulse
card.text: Pyroclastic Pulse deals X damage to each creature and planeswalker your opponents control, where X is the number of land cards in your graveyard. Mountaincycling {2}

card.name: Crushing Tectonics
card.text: Whenever a land card is put into a graveyard from anywhere, put a loam counter on this enchantment. {2}{G}, Remove X loam counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Destroy X target artifacts and/or enchantments.

card.name: Earthshaker Altisaur
card.text: Vigilance, reach, trample Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may sacrifice it. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, draw a card, and add one mana of any color that land could produce.

card.name: Ku'I, Spring's Fecundity
Ku'I, Spring's Fecundity (Alt art)
Surging Defenses
card.text: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Creatures you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. Until your next end step, you may play lands card exiled with this spell.

card.name: Hi'A, Flameweb Titan
card.text: Vigilance, reach Each creature your opponents control with power equal to or less than the number of land cards in your graveyard is goaded. {3}, Sacrifice a land or discard a land card: Draw a card.

card.name: Tiz'Ek, Molten Cycle
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each land card in your graveyard. Whenever Tiz'Ek attacks, surveil 3. You may cast sorcery spells from your graveyard by exiling two land cards from your graveyard in addition to paying their other costs.

card.name: Murasa Skyclave
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a Mountain card and a Forest card, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Blood TVC
card.text: {1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.

card.name: Treasure TVC
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Heavensward, Breakthrough
card.text: Flying, lifelink Whenever Heavensward attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking Vehicle. Crew 2 Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

card.name: Traveling Shipwright
card.text: When this creature enters, create a 3/2 colorless Vehicle artifact token with crew 1. Whenever a Vehicle you control enters, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Ghostfleet Frontrunner
card.text: Flying When this Vehicle enters, you may sacrifice any number of other nonland permanents. For each permanent sacrificed this way, create a 1/1 black Spirit Pirate creature token with flying. Crew 2

card.name: Pallid Deckhand
card.text: Menace, deathtouch Each Vehicle you control has bloodthirst X. (Vehicles you control enters with X +1/+1 counters on them, where X is the damage dealt to your opponents this turn.)

card.name: Craftwork Apprenticeship
card.text: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Create a Treasure token. • Create a 3/2 colorless Vehicle artifact token with crew 1. • Discard up to three cards, then draw that many cards. • Choose a Vehicle you control. It becomes an artifact creature and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Shifting Schooner
card.text: Whenever this Vehicle attacks, you may sacrifice a creature that crewed it this turn. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature or Vehicle card. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Dwarven Duplicator
card.text: When this creature enters, choose any number of target artifact tokens you control with different names. For each of those targets, create a token that's a copy of it.

card.name: Grand Stateship, Mistcutter
card.text: Vehicles you control have vigilance and menace. {T}, Sacrifice another artifact or creature: Create a 1/1 white Sailor artifact creature token with "This token crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater." If that permanent was legendary or a Vehicle, create two of those tokens instead. Crew 3

card.name: Liko, Ark Craftmaster
card.text: Vehicles you control have myriad. Tokens created this way are artifact creatures and aren't legendary. (Whenever a Vehicle with myriad attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of that Vehicle that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile those tokens at end of combat.)

card.name: Pelin, the Efficient
card.text: If one or more artifact tokens would be created under your control, those tokens plus that many Junk tokens are created instead. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Gastrolith Engine
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {3}, {T}, Exile Gastrolith Engine: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Tarnation Vault
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a Swamp card and a Mountain card, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Sailor TVC
card.text: This token crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater.

card.name: Spirit Pirate TVC
card.text: Flying

card.name: Zeppelin TVC
card.text: Flying Crew 3

card.name: Call the Guard
card.text: Choose target opponent. For each creature that player controls, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. Exile Call the Guard with three time counters on it. Suspend 3—{1}{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{W} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Cephalid Barrister
card.text: Ward {1} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.) Commanders you control have ward {1}. Whenever a ward cost of a permanent you control is paid, draw a card.

card.name: Fruitful Discussion
card.text: Overload {X}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.") Target player draws X cards.

card.name: Shian, Time's Tide
card.text: At the beginning of your first upkeep each turn, you get an additional upkeep step after this step. At the beginning of your first end step each turn, you get an additional end step after this step. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

card.name: Kelp Gatherers
card.text: Reach Whenever this creature becomes tapped, you gain 3 life. {2}{G}, {T}: Exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard. Create a Treasure token.

card.name: Scout the Trade Routes
card.text: Whenever a player attacks, if there are no creatures attacking you or a permanent you control, that player may put a land card from their hand onto the battlefield. If an opponent put a land card onto the battlefield this way, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Betel, the Coralthrone
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, untap each nonland permanent you control. Whenever an opponent casts their first noncreature spell each turn, you may embrace. If you do, draw a card. (To embrace, tap two artifacts and/or creatures you control.)

card.name: Seafolk Expertise
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Draw four cards, then you gain life equal to the number of cards in your hand. You may cast a spell with mana value 5 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost. That spell can't be countered.

card.name: Trepi, Aquaculturalist
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each tapped creature you control. {G}{W}, Embrace: You gain 3 life. (To embrace, tap two artifacts and/or creatures you control.)

card.name: Tursi, Peaceful Courier
card.text: During your turn, Tursi has hexproof and indestructible. Whenever Tursi attacks, you and defending player each draw cards equal to its power, then gain life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Meletian Harbor
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a Plains card and an Island card, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Deep-Sea Oddity
card.text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Evolve (Whenever a creature you control enters, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, this creature becomes a copy of up to one other target creature until end of turn, except it's a 0/2 and has changeling and evolve.

card.name: Rippling Deeplord
card.text: If an ability of a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent source you control would trigger, it triggers an additional time. If this creature is mature, that ability triggers two additional times instead.

card.name: Iska, Returned Oneiromancer
card.text: Whenever you cast a permanent spell with mana value 5 or greater, each opponent discards a card. Each opponent who didn't discard a nonland card this way loses 3 life. {T}, Sacrifice another creature: You lose 1 life and draw a card. If that creature had mana value 5 or greater, you lose 3 life and draw three cards instead. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

card.name: Ominous Devilfish
card.text: Impending 4—{1}{B}, Pay 4 life (If you cast this spell for its impending cost, it enters with four time counters and isn't a creature until the last is removed. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter from it.) Flying, menace At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses 1 life and you surveil 1.

card.name: High Quality Gastrolith
card.text: {T}: Add {G}. {G}{G}, {T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

card.name: Inlet Seeker
card.text: Trample When this creature enters, it explores X times, where X is the number of permanents you control with power, toughness, or mana value 5 or higher. (To explore, reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Bilchanip, Caller of Tyrants
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, Serpent, or Whale you control enters, surveil 2 and you gain 2 life. {1}, {T}: Add {B}{G}{U}. Spend this mana only to cast spells with mana value 5 or greater or activate abilities of sources with mana value 5 or greater.

card.name: Deil, Ceaseless Titan
card.text: When Deil enters, you may cast a spell from your hand with mana value less than Deil's power without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Insatiable Rampage
card.text: Choose one— • Each opponent sacrifices an artifact of their choice. • Each opponent sacrifices a creature of their choice. • Each opponent sacrifices an enchantment of their choice. Entwine— Sacrifice two permanents (Choose all if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Kizahn, Depths Eternal
card.text: Kizahn can't be blocked except by three or more creatures. When Kizahn enters, mill seven cards, then put each card with mana value 5 or greater milled this way into your hand.

card.name: Brinebarrow Ruins
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for an Island card and a Swamp card, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Junk TVC
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this token: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
